scripts.format: uv run black src/untrace tests/ && uv run isort src/untrace tests/ || (black src/untrace tests/ && isort src/untrace tests/)
scripts.lint: uv run ruff check src/untrace tests/ || ruff check src/untrace tests/
scripts.test: uv run pytest tests/ -v || pytest tests/ -v
scripts.typecheck: uv run mypy src/untrace || mypy src/untrace
